attributes.action: Revoke UK citizenship for Islamic State fighters.
attributes.additional_details: UK citizens who join the so called Islamic State are traitors to their country. There should be no account taken in to whether this would leave the individual stateless, stranded, or at risk.
attributes.background: When people choose to support this jihadist group they are effectively supporting the murder of their fellow countrymen and so should have their citizenship revoked with immediate effect.
